    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args) throws Throwable
      Parses commandline arguments and executes the language description passed in. If no description is given, the program exits normally
      Parameters:
      args - the commandline arguments
      Throws:
      Throwable - when there is an uncaught exception in user code
      See Also:
      usage(), Parser
